source:
%%pyspark
#Load to Dataframe
df_app = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Application.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_candidate = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Candidate.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_department = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Department.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_job = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Job.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_joblist = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/JobList.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_stage = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Stage.csv', format='csv', header=True)

#Change 'undefined' to empty space
df_app = df_app.fillna(value = "")
df_candidate = df_candidate.fillna(value = "")
df_department = df_department.fillna(value = "")
df_job = df_job.fillna(value = "")
df_joblist = df_joblist.fillna(value = "")
df_stage = df_stage.fillna(value = "")

#display(df_app.limit(5))
#display(df_candidate.limit(5))
#display(df_department.limit(5))
#display(df_job.limit(5))
#display(df_joblist.limit(5))
#display(df_stage.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#Applications + Stage

df_appStage = df_app.join(df_stage, [df_stage['Id'] == df_app ['stageId'], df_stage['applicationId'] == df_app ['id']], 'left') \
    .select(df_app['Id'], df_app['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', col('created').alias('appCreated'), col('disqualified').alias('appDisqualified')
        , col('disqualifiedAt').alias('appDisqualifiedAt'), col('disqualificationReason').alias('appDisqualificationReason')
        , col('name').alias('stage'), 'type', 'jobId', 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appStage.limit(5))
#display(df_joblist.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStage + Job

df_appstJob = df_appStage.join(df_joblist, [df_joblist['Id'] == df_appStage['jobId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason', 'stage', 'type'
        , col('title').alias('job'), df_joblist['departmentId'], df_joblist['locationCountry'], df_joblist['locationCountryCode'], df_joblist['region'], df_joblist['city'], df_joblist['zipCode'], df_joblist['status']
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appstJob.limit(5))

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import functions as f

#Create tagging for each Stage
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("conversion", 
    f.when((f.col("Stage") == "Sourced") | (f.col("Stage") == "Applied"), "Reach")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Screen") | (f.col("Stage") == "OfferToClient"), "Test")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Interview"), "Interview")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Shortlisted") | (f.col("Stage") == "Offer"), "Offer")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Hired"), "Conversion")
    .otherwise("NA"))

#Tag as 1 if Conversion to get which stage are converted
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isReach", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Reach"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isTest", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Test"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isInterview", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Interview"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isOffer", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Offer"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isConversion", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Conversion"), 1).otherwise(0))

#Create new column with removed special characters
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("JobDescNoChar", f.lower(f.translate(f.col("Job"),"./â€“!-() ","")))

#display(df_appstJob.limit(5))
#display(df_department.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJob + Department

df_appstjobDept = df_appstJob.join(df_department, [df_department['Id'] == df_appstJob['departmentId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason'
        , 'stage', 'conversion', 'isReach', 'isTest', 'isInterview', 'isOffer', 'isConversion', 'type'
        , 'job', col('name').alias('department')
        , 'locationCountry', 'locationCountryCode', 'region', 'city', 'zipCode', 'status'
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appstjobDept.limit(5))
#display(df_candidate.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJobDepartment + Candidate

df_appCandidate = df_appstjobDept.join(df_candidate, [df_candidate['Id'] == df_appstjobDept['candidateId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId']
        , df_candidate['firstName'], df_candidate['lastName'], col('created').alias('candidateCreated'), col('lastModified').alias('candidateLastModified')
        , 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason'
        , 'stage', 'conversion', 'isReach', 'isTest', 'isInterview', 'isOffer', 'isConversion', 'type'
        , 'job', 'department'
        , 'locationCountry', 'locationCountryCode', 'region', 'city', 'zipCode', 'status'
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')


#Create FullName column
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.withColumn('fullName', f.concat(f.col('firstName'),f.lit(' '),f.col('lastName')))

#Remove undefined
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.fillna(value = "")

#display(df_appCandidate.limit(5))

##Drop  table in the default database
##%%sql
##DROP TABLE applications
